name: Boho+AbstractBaths
description:
Exploration of Bohemian and Abstract styled bathrooms. 

Elena Glazkova: Editor, Copy Writer 

Sarah Liriano: Art Director

Yiting Liu: Interaction Designer, Unity Developer

WASD or arrow keys to move. Mouse to look around.  Hit the Escape key to quit the game. 

For Windows, uncompress the file and find the BathroomDesignCompetition.app. Double click to run the game.

For Mac, if you are getting unable to open file notifications. Try the following:

Open compressed file 

Right-click - select "New Terminal at Folder" 

In your terminal, type  "cd ../" 

Hit enter 

In another line, copy and paste 

"chmod -R 777 BathBathApp_Mac3.app"

Return back to your place where you downloaded the file

Double click on your app and play.
